name: Curivari - Reserva Limitada Classica - Imperiales
additionalNotes: Curivari Reserva Limitada Classica is another knockout from one of the best ultra boutique cigar brands in the world. Curivari hasn't been around for long, but in a short time, they've gained a dedicated fan base of loyal cigar smokers. How did they do this? By producing limited quantity, high-quality cigars where flavor and construction trump the need for massive production numbers. They make only as many cigars as they can with only the best selection of tobaccos.Â Curivari Reserva Limitada Classic Cigars, This ultra boutique cigar brand is catching the attention of serious cigar aficionados looking for rich and balanced Nicaraguan smokes. This dark and oily Nicaraguan puro packs a punch with rich toasty tobacco flavors, notes of coffee, leather and spice are present.
